amendatorysection.catchline: Clerk of the district court; depositories; securities; list.
amendatorysection.para: The clerk of the district court shall at all times keep and certify to the county board a complete and correct list and description of the securities furnished by any depository to secure the deposits. Section 77-2366 shall apply to deposits in capital stock financial institutions. Section 77-2365.01 shall apply to deposits in qualifying mutual financial institutions.
